questions.question: In which state a balance between recovery and strain hardening is achieved?
Which of the following DOES NOT affect creep rate:
As the temperature increases, the creep rate:
As the obstacle distance Decreases, the creep rate:
Comparatively between two materials, as the steady state creep rate of material-1 is lower (at constant temperature) with respect to material-2, it mean

answers.a: Working life of material-1 will be higher compared to material-2
answers.b: Working life of the material-1 will be same as that of material-2
answers.c: Working life of material-2 will be higher compared to material-1
answers.d: Density of material-2 is higher than that of material-1
